programme.title: Mat 1: Women's -70kg, Men's -90kg Repechages/Semi-Finals/Finals | Judo | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc:
The Women's -70kg and Men's -90kg Finals took place on 31/07/2024 at the Champ-de-Mars Arena, Paris.
At the Women's -70kg, Barbara Matic (CRO) claimed the Gold medal, Miriam Butkereit (GER) won the Silver, and the Bronze medals went to Gabriela Willems (BEL) and Michaela Polleres (AUT).
At the Men's -90kg, Lasha Bekauri (GEO) won the Gold medal, Sanshiro Murao (JPN) took the Silver, and the Bronze medals went to Theodoros Tselidis (GRE) and Maxime-Gael Ngayap Hambou (FRA).

programme.title: Greek champions and children of Athens 2004 keep Olympic flame burning
programme.desc: Twelve years on, we catch up with Olympic heroes Pyrros Dimas and Ilias Iliadis, and the little girl who blew out the 2004 Olympic flame.

programme.title: Women's 1500m Freestyle - Final | Swimming | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's 1500m Freestyle was held on 31/07/2024 at Paris La Defense Arena. Katie LeDecky (USA) claimed Gold with an Olympic record time of 15:30.02 seconds, Anastasiia Kirpichnikova (FRA) took Silver, and Isabel Gose (GER) completed the podium.

programme.title: Men's 200m Breaststroke - Final | Swimming | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Men's 200m Breaststroke was held on 31/07/2024 at Paris La Defense Arena. Leon Marchand (FRA) claimed Gold with a new Olympic Record of 2:05.85, Zac Stubblety-Cook (AUS) took Silver and Casper Corbeau (NED) completed the podium.

programme.title: Men's 100m Freestyle - Final | Swimming | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Men's 100m Freestyle was held on 31/07/2024 at Paris La Defense Arena. Zhanle Pan (CHN) claimed Gold with a new World Record time of 46.40 seconds, Kyle Chalmers (AUS) took Silver, and David Popovici (ROU) completed the podium.

programme.title: Becoming an Olympic Legend | 72 - A Gathering of Champions
programme.desc: Fifty years after his famous tally of seven Olympic gold medals and seven world records, legendary swimmer Mark Spitz makes an emotional return to Munich Olympic Park and the swimming pool, where his life was changed forever.

programme.title: SWE-CHN - Men's Team Gold Medal Match | Table Tennis | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc:
The Men's Team Gold Medal Match Sweden v China, at South Paris Arena 4, Paris, on 09/08/24. Final score CHN 3:0 SWE.
China won Gold, Sweden won Silver and France won Bronze.

programme.title: Road to Glory - Athletics - The Sprinters
programme.desc: A journey through the essential stories of the Olympic Games, focusing on the sprints in athletics, including Jesse Owens and Carl Lewis.

programme.title: Women's Kayak (K1) Semi-Final & Final | Canoe Slalom | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Kayak (K1) Semifinal and Final took place at Nautical St - White Water, on 28/07/24. The Australian Jessica Fox won the Gold with a time of 96.08 seconds. Klaudia Zwolinska (POL) won the Silver, and Kimberley Woods (GBR) won the Bronze Medal.

programme.title: The Distance | Five Rings Films
programme.desc: The story of an enduring Japanese marathon tradition and a humble champion named Naoko Takahashi who captured her nationâ€™s imagination with a run for the ages at the 2000 Olympic Games.

programme.title: Road to Glory - Aquatics
programme.desc: The best diving, swimming and water polo stories from throughout Olympic history including Dawn Fraser, Greg Louganis and Michael Phelps.

programme.title: Finals Piste: Women's Foil Team Bronze & Gold Medal Bouts | Fencing | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's Foil Team Bronze and Gold Medal Bouts took place on 01/08/2024 at the Grand Palais - Podium Piste. In the Gold Medal Bout, United States of America won the Gold over Italy, who won Silver. In the Bronze Medal Bout, Japan took the Bronze over Canada.

programme.title: Women's 200m Butterfly - Final | Swimming | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's 200m Butterfly was held on 01/08/2024 at Paris La Defense Arena. Summer McIntosh (CAN) claimed Gold with an Olympic record time of 2:03.03, Regan Smith (USA) took Silver and Yufei Zhang (CHN) completed the podium.

programme.title: Women's 4x200m Freestyle Relay - Final | Swimming | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's 4x200m Freestyle Relay was held on 01/08/2024 at Paris La Defense Arena. Australia claimed Gold with an Olympic record time of 07:38.08, United States of America took Silver and China completed the podium.

programme.title: Men's 200m Backstroke - Final | Swimming | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Men's 200m Backstroke was held on 01/08/2024 at Paris La Defense Arena. Hubert Kos (HUN) claimed Gold with a time of 1:54.26, Apostolos Christou (GRE) took Silver and Roman Mityukov (SUI) completed the podium.

programme.title: Women's 200m Breaststroke - Final | Swimming | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's 200m Breastroke was held on 01/08/2024 at Paris La Defense Arena. Kate Douglass (USA) claimed Gold with a time of 02:19.24, Tatjana Smith (RSA) took Silver and Tes Schouten (NED) completed the podium.

programme.title: Road to Glory - Aquatics
programme.desc: The best diving, swimming and water polo stories from throughout Olympic history including Dawn Fraser, Greg Louganis and Michael Phelps.

programme.title: Women's Individual All-Around Final | Artistic Gymnastics | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's Individual All-Around Final took place at Bercy Arena on 01/08/2024. Simone Biles won Gold (USA), Rebeca Andrade Silver (BRA) and Sunisa Lee (USA) Bronze.

programme.title: The Journey Begins
programme.desc: With the Tokyo 2020 Olympic Games fast approaching, three of the best gymnasts in the world gear up for the most important year of their lives.

programme.title: Competition Season
programme.desc: Morgan and Angelina attempt to handle the pressure of the world stage. Will they succeed? Yile has a point to prove in training.

programme.title: The World Championships 2019
programme.desc: The World Championships are here. The three gymnasts learn whether theyâ€™re selected for their national teams. All the drama from the biggest competition of the season.

programme.title: Can Russiaâ€™s rhythmic gymnast Margarita Mamun transform this Z Team?
programme.desc: Olympic gold medalist Margarita Mamun tries to turn around the fortunes of Moscowâ€™s Pirouette Gymnastics team. Is one week enough?

programme.title: Memory Lane | 72 - A Gathering of Champions
programme.desc: Fifty years after their Olympic victories in Munich, famed gymnast Olga Korbut, Germanyâ€™s long jump star Heide Rosendahl, Kenyaâ€™s long-distance running hero Kip Keino and Great Britainâ€™s celebrated pentathlete Mary Peters make an emotional return to the scene of their gold medal wins.

programme.title: Semi-Finals & Finals - Day 6 | Swimming | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: This session includes the Women's 200m Butterfly Final, Men's 200m Backstroke Final, Women's 200m Breaststroke Final and Women's 4X200m Freestyle Relay Final. The races took place at Paris La Defense Arena, on 01/08/2024.

programme.title: Road to Glory - Aquatics
programme.desc: The best diving, swimming and water polo stories from throughout Olympic history including Dawn Fraser, Greg Louganis and Michael Phelps.

programme.title: Double Sculls, Fours, Eights, Single Sculls | Rowing | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc:
This session took place at Nautical St - Flat Water, France, on 01/08/24.
At the Women's Double Sculls Final, Gold was claimed by Team New Zealand, Team Romania won Silver, and the Bronze went to Team Great Britain.
At the Men's Double Sculls Final, Team Romania won Gold, Team Netherlands calimed Silver, and Team Ireland completed the podium, with the Bronze.
At the Women's Four Final, it was Gold for Team Netherlands, Silver for Great Britain, and Bronze for New Zealand.
At the Men's Four Final, Gold was claimed by Team USA, the Silver by Team New Zealand, and the Bronze by Team Great Britain.

programme.title: Road to Glory - Gymnastics
programme.desc: Glorious gymnastics moments spanning the history of the Olympic Games, including Olga Korbut, Nadia Comaneci and Yukio Endo.

programme.title: Men's Qualification & Final | Trampoline Gymnastics | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: This event took place on 02/08/2024 at the Bercy Arena, Paris. Ivan Litvinovich (AIN) claimed Gold, Zisai Wang (CHN) took Silver and Langyu Yan (CHN) completed the podium.

programme.title: Viktoriia: Ukraineâ€™s Gymnastics Hope
programme.desc: As the bombs dropped in her hometown of Kyiv and her father left home to fight in the war, Ukrainian rhythmic gymnast Viktoriia Onopriienko battled daily to make her dream â€“ competing in Paris 2024 â€“ come true. This documentary showcases her grit, resilience and determination in her inspiring journey to compete at the Olympic Games. Discover the indomitable spirit of this young athlete as she prepares to represent Ukraine on the world stage.

programme.title: Women's Qualification & Final | Trampoline Gymnastics | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: This event took place on 02/08/2024 at the Bercy Arena, Paris. Bryony Page (GBR) claimed Gold, Viyaleta Bardzilouskaya (AIN) took Silver and Sophiane Methot (CAN) completed the podium.

programme.title: Meet the Olympian bouncing between trampoline and her career as a doctor
programme.desc: Three-time Olympian Ana Rente stumbled into a medical career, but although finding time for training is draining the rewards are huge.

programme.title: Day Jobs | Episode 1
programme.desc: Olympic bronze medallist Chris Fogt is also an army captain while Ana Rente is bouncing between trampoline and her career as a doctor.

programme.title: Sports Swap: Basketball vs Trampoline with Emmeline Ndongue & Kat Driscoll
programme.desc: Can an Olympic trampolinist shoot a 3-pointer? Can a basketball Olympic silver medallist learn a trampoline routine in a day?

programme.title: Men's 50m Freestyle - Final | Swimming | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Men's 50m Freestyle was held at Paris La Defense Arena, on 02/08/2024. Cameron McEvoy (AUS) claimed Gold with a time of 21.25 seconds, Benjamin Proud (GBR) took Silver and Florent Manaudou (FRA) completed the podium.

programme.title: Women's 50m Freestyle - Final | Swimming | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's 50m Freestyle was held at Paris La Defense Arena, on 04/08/2024. Sarah Sjoestroem (SWE) claimed Gold with a time of 23.71, Meg Harris (AUS) took Silver and Yufei Zhang (CHN) completed the podium.

programme.title: Triumph and Tragedy | 72 - A Gathering of Champions
programme.desc: In an emotional journey with his son and grandson, Finlandâ€™s Lasse VirÃ©n revisits the spot where he rose to his feet after a dramatic fall to win gold. The next day, the spirit of Munich was shattered when a terror attack at the Olympic Village took the lives of 11 Israeli athletes and coaches â€“ a day of tragedy as told by an Israeli survivor, Shaul Ladany, and the gold medallists from around the world who bore witness.

programme.title: A Game for Two
programme.desc: Eight Olympic couples share their stories, from competition to life, and love.

programme.title: Watanabe/Higashino (JPN) v Seo/Chae (KOR) - Mixed Doubles Bronze Medal Match | Badminton | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Mixed Doubles Bronze Medal Match between Watanabe and Higashino, from Japan, and Seo and Chae, from the Republic of Korea, took place on 02/08/2024 at La Chapelle Arena. The Japanese pair took the Bronze. FInal Score JPN 2:0 KOR.

programme.title: Zheng/Huang (CHN) v Kim/Jeong (KOR) - Mixed Doubles Gold Medal Match | Badminton | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Mixed Doubles Gold Medal Match between Zheng and Huang, from the People's Republic of China, and Kim and Jeong, from the Republic of Korea, took place on 02/08/2024 at La Chapelle Arena. The Chinese pair took the Gold, and the South Korean pair took the Silver. Final Score CHN 2:0 KOR.

programme.title: The Academy: Forging Indiaâ€™s Badminton Champions
programme.desc: An all access documentary series looking at Indiaâ€™s Pullela Gopichand Badminton Academy and the lives of its top athletes ahead of the Tokyo 2020 Olympic Games.

programme.title: Football Freestyler vs Olympians featuring PWG
programme.desc: Social influencer PWG is paired with windsurfer Shahar Zubari, cross-country skier Vesna Fabjan and badminton Olympic medallist Viktor Axelsen to check out what it takes to be an Olympian.

programme.title: Siniakova/Machac (CZE) v Wang/Zhang (CHN) - Mixed Doubles Gold Medal | Tennis | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Mixed Doubles Gold Medal match between Siniakova/Machac (CZE) v Wang/Zhang (CHN) which took place on Court Philippe Chatrier on 02/08/24. Siniakova/Machac (CZE) won the match with a final score of 6:2, 5:7, 10:8.

programme.title: Doubles Trouble: Rohan Bopannaâ€™s Olympic Journey
programme.desc: Join Indiaâ€™s top menâ€™s doubles tennis player, Rohan Bopanna, as he seeks the perfect partner for Paris 2024. Relive his historic victories, heartbreaking defeats, and past Olympic adventures and witness his relentless pursuit of excellence at age 44. Will he bring India a long-awaited tennis medal?

programme.title: The Olympics On The Record | Episode 10
programme.desc: Williams sisters wipe the floor, the King of Biathlon, a slalom surprise for Slovenia, road race close finish, and China's greatest star.

programme.title: Coming of age: China after Beijing 2008 | Episode 2
programme.desc: The 2008 Beijing Games left Chinese Olympians with millions of social media followers. Today, those same athletes are now at the vanguard of sports business innovation.

programme.title: Mat 1: Women +78 kg Contest for Bronze Medal A | Judo | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: This event took place on 02/08/2024 at the Champ-de-Mars Arena. Kim Hayun (KOR) got the Bronze Medal A with a victory over Kayra Ozdemir (TUR), final score KOR 10:0 TUR.

programme.title: Mat 1: Men +100 kg Contest for Bronze Medal A | Judo | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: This event took place on 02/08/2024 at the Champ-de-Mars Arena. Temur Rakhimov (TJK) get the Bronze Medal A, with a victory over Andy Granda (CUB), final score TJK 1:0 CUB.

programme.title: Japanâ€™s Nomura Tadahiro I Legends Live On
programme.desc: A look at the Olympic achievements of Japanâ€™s three-time gold medallist Nomura Tadahiro, and what he is doing now.

programme.title: Mat 1: Men +100 kg Contest for Bronze Medal B | Judo | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: This event took place on 02/08/2024 at the Champ-de-Mars Arena. Alisher Yusupov (UZB) get the Bronze Medal B, with a victory over Tatsuru Saito (JPN), Final score UZB 11:0 JPN.

programme.title: Mat 1: Men +100 kg Final | Judo | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: This event took place on 02/08/2024 at the Champ-de-Mars Arena. Teddy Riner (FRA) claimed the Gold medal and Kim Minjong (KOR) took Silver. Final score FRA 10:0 KOR.

programme.title: Israeli duo working hard to achieve Olympic dream
programme.desc: Linoy Ashram and Raz Hershko are two of Israel's leading junior athletes seeking to join the nation's Olympic squad.
